trans-unit.source: Represents a row within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示中的行<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The DetailsViewRow class is used to represent an individual row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: DetailsViewRow 类用于表示中的单个行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has a designated row type.
trans-unit.target: 中的每一行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件具有指定的行类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the row types that are valid for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了对有效的行类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The empty data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: |行类型 |说明 | |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件中的数据行。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|中的空数据行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when there are no records to display.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| To determine the row type of a DetailsViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 没有要显示的记录时，是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件中显示空数据行。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件中的页脚行。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件中的标题行。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件中的页导航行。 | 若要确定 DetailsViewRow 对象的行类型，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A DetailsViewRow object also has a state associated with it.
trans-unit.target: DetailsViewRow 对象也有与之关联的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 状态可以是以下表中的值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: |State value|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is in edit mode.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is in insert mode.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is in its normal (default) state.| To determine the state of a DetailsViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: |状态值 |说明 | |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|DetailsViewRow 对象是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件中的交替行。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|DetailsViewRow 对象处于编辑模式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|DetailsViewRow 对象是否在插入模式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|DetailsViewRow 对象处于正常 （默认） 状态。 | 若要确定 DetailsViewRow 对象的状态，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control stores all its data rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件将存储中的所有数据行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of a DetailsViewRow object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定 DetailsViewRow 对象中的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>集合，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the individual cells of the DetailsViewRow object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用访问 DetailsViewRow 对象的各个单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a cell contains controls, you can retrieve a control from the cell by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个单元格包含控件，你可以通过使用，从单元格检索控件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>单元格的集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the cell to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法的单元格来查找该控件中，如果控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> field column or an automatically generated field column, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> property of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索的字段值从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>字段列或自动生成的字段列中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A>单元格的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from other field column types where the field value is bound to a control, first retrieve the control from the appropriate cell and then access the appropriate property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 要从其他字段列类型，其中的字段值绑定到控件中检索字段值，请首先从相应的单元格检索控件，然后访问控件的相应属性。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is possible to use a data-binding expression directly in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> field column without binding the value to a property of a control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可以使用数据绑定表达式中直接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>字段列，而无需将值绑定到控件的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the field value is automatically placed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，字段值将自动放入<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the field value, you must first retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control from the appropriate cell and then use its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索的字段值，必须首先检索<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>控制从相应的单元格，然后使用其<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the DetailsViewRow class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: DetailsViewRow 类的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>的新实例

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>的实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>|The value specified by the `itemIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>|The value specified by the `rowType` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>|The value specified by the `rowState` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>|指定的值`itemIndex`参数。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>|指定的值`rowType`参数。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>|指定的值`rowState`参数。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的行的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to pass an event up the page's ASP.NET server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否将事件沿页的 ASP.NET 服务器控件层次结构向上传递。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果事件已被取消;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref>对象在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: Use the RowIndex property to determine the index of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: RowIndex 属性用于确定的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>对象在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data rows.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性仅适用于数据行。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref>中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取的状态<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the RowState property to determine the state of the row.
trans-unit.target: RowState 属性用于确定行的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 状态可以是以下表中的值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: |State value|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowState.Alternate`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowState.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in edit mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Insert`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in insert mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Normal`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in its normal (default) state.| This property is commonly used to determine the state of a row before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: |状态值 |说明 | |-----------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowState.Alternate`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>对象是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件中的交替行。 | |`DataControlRowState.Edit`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>对象处于编辑模式。 | |`DataControlRowState.Insert`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>对象是否在插入模式。 | |`DataControlRowState.Normal`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>对象处于正常 （默认） 状态。 | 此属性通常用于执行操作之前，确定行的状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取的行类型<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the RowType property to determine the type of row that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object represents.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RowType 属性，以确定的一种行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>对象所表示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid row type values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了有效的行类型值。

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowType.DataRow`|A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.EmptyDataRow`|The empty data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: |行类型 |说明 | |--------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowType.DataRow`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件中的数据行。 | |`DataControlRowType.EmptyDataRow`|中的空数据行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when there are no records to display.| |`DataControlRowType.Footer`|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.Header`|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.Pager`|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| This property is commonly used to determine a row's type before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: 没有要显示的记录时，是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件中显示空数据行。 | |`DataControlRowType.Footer`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件中的页脚行。 | |`DataControlRowType.Header`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件中的标题行。 | |`DataControlRowType.Pager`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件中的页导航行。 | 此属性通常用于在执行操作之前确定某一行的类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref>值。
